stateDiagram

IDLE

IDLE : IDLE

IDLE : enter / #123; SetVelocity(0, 0)#59; #125;

IDLE : do / #123; UpdateAnimation("Idle")#59; #125;

MOVING

MOVING : MOVING

MOVING : enter / #123; SetMovementDirection(inputDirection)#59; #125;

MOVING : do / #123; UpdateVelocity(inputDirection)#59; #125;

MOVING : do / #123; UpdateAnimation("Moving")#59; #125;

ATTACKING

ATTACKING : ATTACKING

ATTACKING : enter / #123; StartAttackAnimation()#59; #125;

ATTACKING : do / #123; PerformAttack()#59; #125;

ATTACKING : exit / #123; ResetAttack()#59; #125;

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

IDLE --> MOVING : MOVE_INPUT

MOVING --> IDLE : STOP_INPUT

MOVING --> ATTACKING : ATTACK_INPUT

ATTACKING --> IDLE : do [attackFinished]

ROOT.(InitialState) --> IDLE
Events
settings
